    Form Upload.

    • Method Detail

      • contentType

        String contentType()
        Returns:
        Upload's content-type or null if not defined

      • charset

        Returns:
        Upload's charset or null if not defined

        Returns:

      • length

        long length()
        Returns:
        Upload's length

        Returns:
        InputStream to the upload data

      • asBytes

        byte[] asBytes()
        Returns:
        Upload data bytes

      • asString

        String asString()
        Returns:
        Upload data as a String using the upload character encoding if defined, the QiWeb default character encoding otherwise.

      • asString

        String asString(Charset charset)
        Parameters:
        charset - Charset to use
        Returns:
        Upload data as a String

        Move upload data to a File.
